title: Geocoding lookup for spatial search
description:
Hi,
for searching locations "nearby" a address it would be a great enhancement to have a geocoding lookup through a webservice (like google geocoding,...) which results (lat long) can be used for spatial search.

e.g.

?q=party&nearby=street+123,+city

comments.author: Chris A. Mattmann
comments.content: Take a look here: http://github.com/chrismattmann/solrcene for a list of patches that my student and I did to Lucene and Solr way back when (patches that are included and unapplied in JIRA here) to implement this.
